body_en: The topic of nuclear war is also being vigorously discussed in the media in connection with the intention of Sweden and Finland to join the NATO bloc, namely that the North Atlantic Alliance cannot guarantee the non-deployment of nuclear weapons in these countries. It is noteworthy that the reaction of the Russian media to the statement of the Assistant Secretary General of NATO and individual comments by former European politicians regarding the transfer of nuclear weapons to Ukraine was disproportionate and excessively sensitive.
